  • If you don't like the color of this text  simply select this text and change it...
  • Or switch to change background color by clicking on "fontcolor"...
  • With a double click anywhere you can create a new textbox.
  • The functions of the rich buttons should be clear :-)
  • When you move your mouse on the pragm logo or to the upper right you will see your last opened files and some drawing functions, which are at the moment out of order.
  • By clicking on the "dark" pragm logo you will return to the explorer.
  • Open a new window next to the actual one and see what happens when you edit.
  • A empty textbox is deleted on blur
1007980862: 0024100440This is pragm, a realtime multiuser scratchpad which is easily expandable with more objects than this simple textbox.
